flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: A couple of months ago, I had this bike that I made from an old frame that I had found in the dumpsters. It was nice and I could only enjoy it for a couple of days because it got stolen. Yep...sad. Anyway this week-end I found the exact same frame in a bike shop. 30 $ no wheels no seat no handles. I figured I'd remake my project with some parts I had left and make it better !

lines.text: So this is the frame, I already started working on it, I chopped of all the brakets that were unusefull since I want a clean look. I left only the front brakes, patched all the holes and next step will be sanding it properly for the primer.

guide.summary: I'll try and make a single speed bike out of a salvaged Peugeot frame.
